title: [Sponsor] Atoms × MKBHD 251.1
content:
Marques Brownlee and Atoms is a partnership between innovators with a shared love for creativity, craftsmanship, and storytelling. This limited edition Model 251.1 is our second collaborative sneaker and features a matte black design with reflective details, blending function, style, and comfort. Designed for everyday comfort, the 251.1 also includes a water-repellent upper and membrane, making it one of the most versatile sneakers you can own.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
